description:
After Mizuno`s tragic accident, the tension in class 3 escalates, and Akazawa is chosen as the new female class officer without Kouichi`s knowledge. His classmates have been discussing something behind his back, but nobody will tell him why. Takabayashi doesn`t agree with the methods taken by the class, so he offers to answer Kouichi`s questions, but then...
Source: crunchyroll
